attributes.action: cancel employment of smoking inspectors and employ real police officers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The councils are spending 30 million pounds on smoking inspectors even though they need more police officers to fight real crime. This is at a time when our young people are being murdered in their own homes. Is this crazy or what.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
